note.p: Death: Upcott, near Taunton, Somerset (11 March 1795)
Career: Physician, Bristol Infirmary (1760-1780); practised in Bristol, then in Taunton; translated Hippocrates "Epidemics"
Notes: Note on election certificate: 'The Election of Dr Saml Farr is void on account of his not appearing within the time allowed by the Society for his admission.'
